definition.text:
Piety; belief in God, and reverence for his character and laws.
1. A religious life; a careful observance of the laws of God and performance of religious duties, proceeding from love and reverence for the divine character and commands; christian obedience.Godliness is profitable unto all things. 1 Timothy 4:7.
2. Revelation; the system of christianity.Without controversy, great is the mystery of godliness; God was manifest in the flesh. l Tim.
